name: YouTube 2012 Polymer {BROKEN}
description:
Make YouTube look like Cosmic Panda on the new design! Incorporates some elements from the 2015 YouTube design.


This is best to be used with:
https://userstyles.org/styles/147374/youtube-old-colors
https://userstyles.org/styles/162809/youtube-s-2011-2012-html-5-player
additional_info:
v0.1
+old guide
+old logo
+old search bar width
+pressing the guide button hides the guide instead of minimizes
+old home page results
+old video text
Items not yet covered:
-channel page
-video size (plz help me tackle this)
-absolute position for masthead and guide
-bold font on most areas
-old icons on guide
-search results
-masthead Browse/Upload/Channel Name
-old watch later button on video
-replies
